It is being said that there’s an asteroid closing in on a safe Earth flyby which is nothing unusual. However, the 1998 OR2, which was first discovered in 1998, is a bit different. The Virtua… [+1427 chars]

articles.author: Debargha Maiti
articles.title: Milky Way core flared up like a lighthouse in the recent past? - Morning Picker
articles.description: Our Milky Way galaxy does look quite peaceful most of the time, but recent, but in recent past, it has some other stories behind this. Several scientists from worldwide came jointly and found evidence that few millions of years ago, the center of our home gal…
